q: The documents obligatory in the car must be ______
optionb: ... the originals or well made copies.

q: What is obligatory in the car?
A car you can drive with a driving licence B is a car with a M.A.W. of maximum (______) kg.

The M.A.W. is set by ______

A.
B.
C.
This combination of signs applies to ______ .
A road with 2x2 lanes segregated by a verge. Past these signs the blue car is allowed to drive maximum (______) km/hour.
The real weight of the car + the load + the persons, if you put everything on a certain moment on a scale, it is called ______
This combination of signs applies to ______
What is not obligatory in the car?

What is obligatory in the car?

A. Nr. 1.
B. Nr. 2.
C. Nr. 3.

A driver has his provisional licence B.
Is he already allowed to drive a light truck?

You have a provisional licence B.
Are you allowed to drive with a light truck over this bridge?
This traffic sign applies to ______
A car, load included, is allowed to be maximum (______) meters high.
e: The load and the passenger spaces

q: The width of the seat of the driver must be (______) cm.
e: The load and the passenger spaces'. Driver: 55 cm. Passengers: 40 cm.

q: When are the back lights allowed to be hidden away by the load ?
e: The load and the passenger spaces
optionb: During the day between 09 am and 06pm.

q: A load, without a special warning marker, may project at the rear of the bodywork of a car, maximum (______) meters.
e: The load and the passenger spaces

q: This prohibitive sign applies ______
e: The load and the passenger spaces

q: How far may a load project beyond the front bodywork of the car ?
e: The load and the passenger spaces
optionc: Material that can not be taken apart max. 3 meters.

q: This sign indicates that vehicles wider than 3.5m are not allowed to drive on.
e: The load and the passenger spaces

q: Someone who is 6 months pregnant ______
e: The load and the passenger spaces
optionb: ... doesn't have to wear a safety belt.

q: When do you have to increase the tyre pressure a bit?
e: The load and the passenger spaces
optiona: You have to drive in the mountains.
optionb: There is a lot of snow and ice.
optionc: You have a long journey ahead of you.

q: This sign indicates: no entry to drivers of vehicles which, load included, exceed the width shown.What kind of sign is this ?
e: The load and the passenger spaces

q: When there are 2 seat belts in the back of the car, only (______) persons maximum are allowed to take place in the back.
e: The load and the passenger spaces

q: The width of the seat of a passenger must be at least (______) cm.
e: The load and the passenger spaces
